headline.main: The Toy War for Holiday Movies Is a Battle Among 3 Heavyweights

lead_paragraph: Let the product tie-in wars begin. The young wizard Harry Potter doesn't make his first appearance on movie screens until Nov. 16, but he can already be found staring across the toy store aisles at a green, one-eyed creature named Mike Wazowski, an animated star of the hit film ''Monsters, Inc.''
abstract: Product tie-in wars for toys based on new motion pictures are already heating up for holiday season; Harry Potter does not appear in theaters until Nov 16, but boy wizard can already be found in stores, facing off with characters from Monsters Inc; just over horizon is army of action figures and toys pegged to Dec 19 release of Fellowship of the Rings, third big contender; photos (M)

keywords.value: HARRY POTTER AND THE SORCERER'S STONE (MOVIE)
